learning_objectives: Identify and sing 'so' and 'mi' on pitch
Perform simple rhythm patterns using 'ta' and 'ti-ti'
warmup_activities: Vocal sirens and pitch-matching with body movement
Echo clapping and solfa echo singing
main_activities: Play pitch game using solfa hand signs
Practice writing 'so-mi' patterns using colour-coded magnets

differentiation.support: Use pitch ladders or hand-sign visuals for support
differentiation.challenge: Have pupils improvise a 4-beat phrase using so-mi

assessment.formative: Observe pitch matching and rhythmic accuracy during echo activities
assessment.summative: Students notate or perform a short so-mi melody

notes: Ensure children internalize pitch by combining movement and solfa

learning_objectives: Maintain a steady beat during ensemble activity
main_activities: Layer rhythm ostinatos and perform in groups

differentiation.support: Use visual rhythm cards with colours

assessment.summative: Students compose and perform a 4-bar rhythm
